name: Beauty and the Bandit Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What sport was on TV in the diner in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
NASCAR.

	Specifically the race was the Coca Cola 600. Bandit was set to be the grand marshall for the race, but he hadn't yet made it to the track.

questions.text: What restaurant did Bandit meet the titular "Beauty" at?
questions.explanation:
Hilltop Restaurant.

	Her name was Crystal and she was getting out of a limo when he pulled up. The sign out front said "Welcome Bandit" in large letters.Crystal ended up being a thorn in Bandit's side.

questions.text: Where was Bandit when he was mugged?
options: In the alley behind a restaurant.
questions.explanation:
In the bathroom.

	He was mugged by Crystal. She pulled a little pistol out of her purse, when in the bathroom and demanded the keys to his car. She took his car and the two men who were with her left in the limo. Later Bandit found out the mini gun was a cigarette lighter.

questions.text: What for of transportation did the Bandit use to get try to the racetrack?
questions.explanation:
A bus.

	Bandit took over driving a bus for an injured busdriver. He had a class A license and was legally able to do so. The bus was on its way to Palm Beach, Florida.

questions.text: What group of people did Bandit run into on his travels?
questions.explanation:
Nudists.

	The nudists trying to shuck the bonds of their oppressing society, in other words their clothes.Bandit eventually befriended them and they decided to help him rather than go on their trip.

questions.text: What happened to Bandit's car when Crystal took it?
questions.correct: She drove it into a lake.
options: She drove it to fast and blew up the engine.
She drove it into a lake.
questions.explanation:
She drove it into a lake.

	This was the second time in as many of the made-for-TV films that someone had driven his Dodge Stealth into a lake. He recovered the car as it was being towed away and he put it on a tow dolly behind the bus.

questions.text: Did Bandit make it to the racetrack on time?
questions.explanation:
No.

	They started the race without him. He was supposed to be the grand marshall. Instead Bandit stayed with Crystal and the nudists.While he never got to be the grand marshall, he did manage to "win" by saving the day and rescue Crystal from her gangster boyfriend.

questions.text: Crystal was a model for a liquor company. Which brand did she represent?
questions.explanation:
Tequila Gold.

	Though she didn't initially tell Bandit about her modelling career, there were a couple of moments where Crystal was seen as a pin up. She was seen in a magazine and later on a poster as "Ms. Tequila Gold. Kathy Ireland, the actress, was actually a pin up model before turning to acting.

questions.text: An impersonator of which "king" befriended Bandit when they stopped at a motel?
questions.explanation:
Elvis.

	Elvis was a bus driver who was out of work and got a job impersonating the "King of Rock and Roll". Elvis then saw Crystal on the news and decided to help out the Bandit rather than take the bus on down to Palm Springs. His CB handle was Hound dog.

questions.text: What was the name of the accountant who had worked for the gangster?
questions.explanation:
Stanley.

	Bandit and Crystal managed to track him down and keep him safe during the latter half of the movie. Crystal and her son were promised new names and identities from the FBI for helping in the arrest.
